ygData.subject: Re: Bard Superstitions?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I also am a 22nd Sylly and have all my songs up to 28 squirreled away. That s not the problem Silly , it s called Dying... I was halfway into the level
ygData.messageBody:
James Schuldes wrote:
>
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Ok, I have been "stuck" in level 22 for a good long week now. I think I
> have found the cause. Last time I was at the library in HighKeep, I bought
> my 23rd level song. Does anyone else thing buying songs ahead of time is
> bad luck???
>
> Sylly Songsynger
> Bard of the 22st song

I also am a 22nd Sylly and have all my songs up to 28 squirreled away.
That's not the problem "Silly", it's called Dying... I was halfway into
the level when I started helping some poor guys "sickened" by Evil eyes
in the Gorge.. I died 3 times that evening... I know we all have a
shield with a great Red Cross painted on it but I can't tell you how
many evenings I have lost helping others. A friend who was the same
level as a cleric is now at 30th and I play hours every day.

Moonflower Bllue
C-Z
